title: Sine and Cosine - Points on Circle

content.description: The center of the circle is the origin. Point P is on the circle. An angle in standard position is labeled as follows: The fraction has measure negative pi over 3. The terminal ray of the angle is in quadrant 4 and ends where it intersects the circle at point P. Clockwise from top, the circle passes through the following points: (0 comma 3) (3 comma 0) (0 comma negative 3) (negative 3 comma 0)
content.question: The figure shows a circle of radius <math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math> centered at the origin in the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane and an angle of measure <math alttext="negative pi over 3"><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mi>Ï€</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math> in standard position. What are the coordinates of point <math alttext="P"><mi>P</mi></math> on the terminal ray that intersects this circle of radius <math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parentheses 1 half comma negative fraction numerator square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses 3 over 2 comma negative fraction numerator 3 square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses fraction numerator square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction comma negative 1 half close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses fraction numerator 3 square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction comma negative 3 over 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parentheses 3 over 2 comma negative fraction numerator 3 square root of 3 over denominator 2 end fraction close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
